title: Sidmouth Beach
desc: Sidmouth beach, has pebbles which is due to them being added in the mid 1990s, prior to this the stones were small shingle stones on the beach.

title: Sidford - (Town North)
desc: Pictures are from the Sidford area of Sidmouth mainly with the area around the river sid.

title: Woolbrook - (Town North)
desc: Pictures are from the Woolbreak area of Sidmouth which is at the base of Core hill in the area.

title: Sidmouth Town - (Just north from the beach area of Sidmouth)
desc: Pictures are from the Sidmouth Town area of Sidmouth, mainly in the area of the highstreet.
